summary: Scooby and Shaggy tell an Arabic Caliph two stories, the first about Aliyah-din, a young girl aided by two genies played Yogi and Boo-Boo and the second about Sinbad the Sailor played by Magilla Gorilla.
cast: Don Messick|Casey Kasem|Greg Burson|Allan Melvin|Jennifer Hale|Rob Paulsen|John Kassir|Charlie Adler|Eddie Deezen|Maurice LaMarche|Brian Cummings|Paul Eiding|Nick Jameson|Tony Jay|Kath Soucie|Frank Welker
keywords: 1990s|animal character name in title|scooby doo character|magilla gorilla character|yogi bear character
title: Scooby-Doo en Noches de Arabia
